Class Room

java.lang.Object
main.Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a room in the hotel system. It contains details about the room, such as its ID, number, type, price, and availability.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Room.RoomType
    Enumeration representing the possible types of rooms.
